topic.title: ZeroPlay
topic.body: What happened to the movies? How do I access them? Are they blocked?

1538259707_1JAnUGRgomRpQZNvhGF6VwmLLmgqJ.body: I have Vuze as a client. I like play for my magnet links. It is one of my favorite things about zero net I just couldn't find it for some reason. Thank you big time
Yes yes that is the play I wanted! Thank you thank you.
